segments.text: How infuriating, the sink is overflowing uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That faucet needs to be turned off right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water ruining the floor and cabinets, what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in the mess, completely checked out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are climbing for cookies behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is on the verge of collapsing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could get hurt, and she's not watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is aiding this nonsense, reaching up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is pure negligence in a family setting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside mocks the indoor disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's intervening here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to watch such avoidable chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
